title: Action & Suspense - Orchestral Music Pack
description: Eighteen orchestral action and suspenseful music tracks for your action / adventure / science fiction games. Evoking a wide different range of styles from Films, Television and Video Games thrilling suspense, action and battle music.
longDescription:
Orchestral Suspense Music Preview

Orchestral Action Music Preview


Eighteen orchestral action and suspenseful music tracks for your action / adventure / science fiction games. Evoking a wide different range of styles from Films, Television and Video Games thrilling suspense, action and battle music.

 

Orchestral Action Tracklist:

Tactical Espionage [3min 13 sec]

Sword Fight [26sec]

Action Man [18sec]

Good Guys Epic Win [48sec]

Entering Danger [58sec]

Battlezone [2min 01 sec]

Epic Trailer [2min 07 sec]

Epic Grand FInale [1min 11sec]


Orchestral Suspense Tracklist:

Sea Monster [ 1 min 03 sec ]

New Discovery [ 0 min 50 sec ]

House of Cards [ 0 min 25 sec ]

Ancient Tomb [ 1 min 0 sec]

Lament [ 1 min 0 sec ]

Evil Plan [ 0 min 31 sec]

Creepy Hall [ 1 min 06 sec]

Enigmatic [ 3 min 15 sec]

Mischief Kids [ 2 min 13 sec ]

East LA Night [ 3 min 05 sec ]

 

Total time: 25 min 33 sec
technicalDetails:
Features

Number of Audio Wavs: 18

Number of Audio Cues: 18

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 25 mins 33 secs

Supported Development Platforms: ALL
